name: GrinMan
description:
GrinMan is arcade game with miscellaneous levels and easy control. Just move your finger right, left, up or down in any place of the screen and GrinMan will go to this direction.Four enemies roam the maze, trying to catch player. If an enemy touches player, he loses a life. Whenever player occupies the same tile as an enemy, he is considered to have collided with that ghost. When all lives have been lost, the game ends.

Main features:

- Growing complexity and dimension of mazes;
- Simple and nice sounds
- Share With Your Friends

How To Play :

=> Move Your Finger Right,Left,Up & Down and Got a Fruit
=> Collect a Fruit and Get more Point
